title: 2023 TV Preview With BBC Radio 5 Live's Scott Bryan
content: There's a lot of big telly coming your way in 2023, so friend of the show - and all-round TV expert - Scott Bryan dropped by the Radio 1 studios to chat to Ali about what to look forward to, from Nolly to The Last Of Us to Loki to The Mandalorian to... The list goes on and on. As you'll hear!

itunes.subtitle: Scott Bryan dropped by to chat to Ali about what to look forward to on TV this year.
